title: Fast AI Transformation
description: Optimize AI style transformation pipeline for sub-3-second generation time, implementing caching, queue management, and progressive loading for better user experience

objective.so_that: I can explore different styles without waiting

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN user selects a style THEN show preview transformation within 3 seconds
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Measure time from style click to preview display

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN transformation requested THEN return 512px preview immediately, upgrade to full-res in background
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Verify low-res returned first, then high-res update

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN same image+style combination requested THEN return cached result instantly
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Request same transformation twice, verify second is instant

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN cached result older than 7 days THEN regenerate on next request
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Mock old cache entry, verify regeneration

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN transformation queue full THEN prioritize paid/logged-in users, show queue position to others
WHEN user has 3 pending transformations THEN queue additional requests, show 'עיבוד...' indicator
WHEN transformation completes THEN stream image progressively (JPEG progressive or blurhash)
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Verify progressive JPEG headers or blurhash placeholder

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN image uploaded THEN pre-generate top 3 most popular styles in background
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Upload image, verify background jobs queued

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN queue depth > 10 THEN scale up GPU workers, scale down after 5 min idle
WHEN transformation fails THEN retry 3 times with exponential backoff, then show error
WHEN user exceeds 20 transformations/minute THEN return 429 with retry-after header
WHEN transformation completes THEN log duration, model, cache_hit to observability system

infrastructure.cache: Redis for transformation cache with R2 for result storage
infrastructure.gpu: Replicate or Modal for GPU inference

caching_strategy.storage: R2 for images, Redis for metadata

test_categories.name: Queue Management
examples: should limit concurrent requests per user

test_categories.name: Error Handling
examples: should return error after max retries

identified_hazards.description: GPU costs spike from high usage
identified_hazards.mitigation: Budget alerts, auto-scaling limits, usage dashboard
TTL expiration, LRU eviction, storage monitoring
Auto-scaling, queue depth alerts, graceful degradation

stop_conditions: GPU costs exceed daily budget by 2x
safety.rollback_plan: Disable caching and queue, fall back to synchronous processing with longer timeouts
